00045 void AssemblyMediator::initialize(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00046 {
00047         if (m_Assembly != NULL)
00048         {
00049                 m_initialized = true;
00050 
00051                 old_x = m_Assembly->getX();
00052                 old_y = m_Assembly->getY();
00053                 old_z = m_Assembly->getZ();
00054 
00055                 scale_x = m_Assembly->getScaleX();
00056                 scale_y = m_Assembly->getScaleY();
00057                 scale_z = m_Assembly->getScaleZ();
00058 
00059                 phi_old   = m_Assembly->getPhi();
00060                 theta_old = m_Assembly->getTheta();
00061                 rho_old   = m_Assembly->getRho();
00062 
00063                 window_w = event.getWinX();
00064                 window_h = event.getWinY();
00065 
00066                 gl_xmax = event.getWorldXmax();
00067                 gl_xmin = event.getWorldXmin();
00068 
00069                 gl_ymax = event.getWorldYmax();
00070                 gl_ymin = event.getWorldYmin();
00071 
00072                 gl_zmax = event.getWorldZmax();
00073                 gl_zmin = event.getWorldZmin();
00074 
00075                 cam_rot_x = event.getCamRotatedX();
00076                 cam_rot_y = event.getCamRotatedY();
00077                 cam_pos   = event.getCamPosition();
00078                 obj_pos   = m_Assembly->getCenterVertex();
00079 
00080                 m_mouse_x = event.getMouseEvent().GetX();
00081                 m_mouse_y = event.getMouseEvent().GetY();
00082         }

00091 int AssemblyMediator::translate(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00092 {
00093         //if no active assembly, return
00094         if (m_initialized && m_Assembly != NULL)
00095         {
00096                 //do specific translations
00097                 switch (m_Translation)
00098                 {
00099                 case MOVEXZ:
00100                         MoveXZ(event);
00101                         break;
00102                 case MOVEXY:
00103                         MoveXY(event);
00104                         break;
00105                 case ROTATEXY:
00106 //                      if (m_Assembly->isType(IS_GROUP))
00107 //                      {
00108 //                              //forbid rotate in x-axis
00109 //                              RotateY(event);
00110 //                              return 0;
00111 //                      }
00112                         RotateXY(event);
00113                         break;
00114                 case ROTATEXZ:
00115 //                      if (m_Assembly->isType(IS_GROUP))
00116 //                      {
00117 //                              //forbid rotate in x and z-axis
00118 //                              RotateY(event);
00119 //                              return 0;
00120 //                      }
00121                         RotateXZ(event);
00122                         break;
00123                 default:
00124                         MoveXZ(event);
00125                         break;
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 return 0;
00129         }
00130 
00131         return 1;
00132 }

00134 void AssemblyMediator::finalize()
00135 {
00136         //is active assembly, return
00137         if (m_initialized && m_Assembly != NULL && (int)m_Assembly != 0)
00138         {
00139                 CommandTransform* command = new CommandTransform;
00140                 command->setAssembly(m_Assembly);
00141                 Vertex old_pos(old_x, old_y, old_z);
00142                 command->setOldPosition(old_pos);
00143                 Vertex old_angles(phi_old, theta_old, rho_old);
00144                 command->setOldAngles(old_angles);
00145                 Vertex new_pos(m_Assembly->getX(), m_Assembly->getY(), m_Assembly->getZ());
00146                 command->setNewPosition(new_pos);
00147                 Vertex new_angles(m_Assembly->getPhi(), m_Assembly->getTheta(), m_Assembly->getRho());
00148                 command->setNewAngles(new_angles);
00149 
00150                 UndoRedo* undo = UndoRedo::getInstance();
00151                 undo->enqueue(command);
00152 
00153                 m_Assembly = NULL;
00154         }
00155 }
